attributes.action: provide bereavement midwives for all hospitals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that there should be a bereavement midwife available for all mothers that lose there babies, especially those that have to deliver and bury there newborn child.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide bereavement midwives for all hospitals."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18345

Prime Minister's Office
